What is BattleZone?

BattleZone is India's premier esports platform for BGMI, PUBG Mobile, and Free Fire tournaments with real money prizes. Join 50,000+ active players competing in skill-based matches with entry fees starting from ‚Çπ10. Winners receive prizes directly to their wallet and can withdraw via UPI within 24-48 hours. Our advanced anti-cheat system ensures fair play for all participants.

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about playing on BattleZone

To join BGMI tournaments on BattleZone: 1) Create a free account using your mobile number, 2) Complete KYC verification with Aadhaar or PAN card, 3) Add money to your wallet via UPI or bank transfer, 4) Browse available matches and click "Join", 5) Receive room ID and password 15 minutes before the match starts. Entry fees start from just ‚Çπ10.
Yes, BattleZone is completely legal in India. We operate as a skill-based gaming platform, not gambling. BGMI, PUBG Mobile, and Free Fire are classified as games of skill where player expertise determines the outcome. We require mandatory KYC verification and comply with all applicable Indian gaming regulations.
Withdrawals on BattleZone are processed within 24-48 hours after your request. You can withdraw via UPI (instant) or direct bank transfer. The minimum withdrawal amount is ‚Çπ100. Make sure your KYC verification is complete and your bank details match your KYC documents for smooth processing.
BattleZone employs a multi-layer anti-cheat system: 1) Screenshot verification with EXIF metadata analysis, 2) Duplicate image detection to prevent reused screenshots, 3) Manual admin review for suspicious activities, 4) Player reporting system, 5) Permanent bans for confirmed cheaters. This ensures fair play for all legitimate players.
Entry fees on BattleZone start from as low as ‚Çπ10 for basic matches. We offer a range of entry fees: ‚Çπ10, ‚Çπ25, ‚Çπ50, ‚Çπ100, ‚Çπ200, and ‚Çπ500 to accommodate players of all budget levels. Higher entry fee matches typically have larger prize pools.
Yes! BattleZone works on both iOS and Android devices. You can access the platform through our web app on any modern browser, or download our dedicated Android app. The games themselves (BGMI, PUBG Mobile, Free Fire) need to be installed separately from their respective app stores.
Room ID and password are shared 15 minutes before the match starts. You will receive them through: 1) In-app notification, 2) Your dashboard on the match details page, 3) SMS (if enabled). Make sure to join the room on time as matches start punctually.
BattleZone currently supports three popular mobile games: 1) BGMI (Battlegrounds Mobile India) - All modes including Classic, TDM, Arena, 2) PUBG Mobile - For players in regions where available, 3) Free Fire - Battle royale and Clash Squad modes. We regularly add new games based on player demand.

Still have questions? We're here to help.
